name: Big Ape
review: Best eyebrow pencil for the money.

I'm not a fan of the gel and can't tell the difference when I use it compared to not using it.

If Revlon ever discontinues this product, I would be very sad. I have tried many other eyebrow products, but never have as good results as this one.

name: Kathy
review:
Goes on smooth and gentle for a natural look. Best blonde shade I've found. Gel Brush keeps brow hairs looing groomed. Good value for the quality.
Design does not allow the entire pencil to be utilized, cannot sharpen the last one half inch of the pencil, might try different sharpner.

name: Okie2TexanGirl

name: nitzie
review: It works well

name: Deena the Diva
review: Really like the way it makes my brows appear so natural.

name: LindaL

name: SweetAnnie49
review: I've tried several brands of brow pencils, and this is the best as far as color match.  And having the gel in the same product is an added bonus. Absolutely the best!

name: Liz

I gave it four stars only because I become irritated when the plastic snap on cap for the pencil end becomes cracked or loosens from repeated use and will not stay attached to cover the pencil. It happens with every Fantasy Brow Pencil that I buy.

name: SyndeRex
review: Absolutely HORRID color & consistency...I'd rather deal with my (basically) see-thru eyebrows than use this product...

name: peg
review: have white eybrows and eylashes and it covers so natural nobody realizes I have such white eyebrows

review: This product was ok. It wasn't amazing or anything. Its easy to remove and and everything, but I think my biggest complaint would be tht it applies so darn thick! review: This really holds your eyebrows in a shape nicely.  I really like it.  It does make your eyebrows "feel"  like there is makeup on them so they have more texture to them but I still think its great.

name: Buyer

name: Cattle Rustlin Carol

review:
I use this pencil daily. It
does not wear off. My brows are blond and thin. When I use the gel portion it makes my brows look a little fuller. I wish the pencil would last longer. I find I am buying the item every 4-6 wks. Thank you for this good product.

name: DW
review: Eye brows thin with age and this product really allows you to bring out each hair using the gel then if you need to fill in a bit the pencil end is readily available.  The gel really allows you to dress your brow and keep it all looking naturally young.

name: LV Lady

name: cl
review: I like the color but it is not long lasting and the liquid on the other side of the pencil is a waste.

Oh and it lasts through a work day. I haven't had any issues with quality.

name: Molly

name: Jo

Only downside is you have to apply pretty fast or the gel will clump a little and you'll have a darker spot in your brow.

name: Henny

name: Mrs
review: It is easy to apply

review:
Use every day in the morning and it stays on all day.

name: Joan the laughter yoga gal

name: Jean
review: Very easy to use!

name: Ree

I wasn't so sure about the pencil side, I was looking for a mechanical and was worried this would be like so many other pencils, hard, difficult to work with, crumbly and scratchy. But i was extremely pleased to find it had a great consistency, was easily and smoothly sharpened and did a great job. I'm really happy I go this after considering many, many options. the only draw back is realizing how fast I'm going through it. the short pencil isn't going to last that long, I wish they sold it separately and full size to keep at home while I take this with me. I also had no problems with wear, it lasted until I took it off.

name: Sa

name: Southern Lady
review: Combination product is easy to use and carry along for touch-ups.

name: NikkiB
review: Great product and awesome value.

name: Mplscarrie
review:
I use this everyday. This is an ideal product for blondes. Most eyebrow pencils are too dark for me and don't look natural. This is just the right shade (dark blonde) for me.
I use this according to directions and it works fine.
My only complaint(s) is that I go through it rather quickly. Luckily the price is right. And I also would like to to last longer. I do notice by the middle of the day I need a touch up but overall it is easy to apply and just the right shade for me.

name: Busy mama
review: It is difficult to find a brow pencil for blonde brows that doesn't look orange so I love this brand!

name: Erika
review:
I really enjoy using this product to fill in my medium thick eybrows. It adds enough color to fill in some of the thinner areas without being obnoxious. There is no distinct line, it's more for blending which I love!

I only use it to fill in, it would not work to extend, or on it's own. In other words, it has to go in hair!

My biggest complaint is the pencil cap breaks within a day or two of being in my make up bag. I'm on my 6th or 7th one and it happens everytime. My other issue is you can only sharpen the pencil down so far before it gets to small to sharpent

name: none
review: IAM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT.  SOMETIMES IT IS HARD TO FIND IN STORES.  YOU DONT KEEP UP THE DEMAND FOR THE PRODUCT.

name: Traveler
review: My natural brow is quite little so using this helps define brow line in a very easy application and natural look.

name: IndyGirl
review:
I have black brows and a coffe with cream complexion. I bought the Brunette because I forgot to pack my Anastasia DipBrow and Gel. The product did not fill in my brows or outline them very well. Also wore off quite quickly. The gel deposits a lot of product, even after wiping the brush very well. In addition, the product showed up as brown.
I probably should have purchased the dark brown color. However, the fact that it wears off quickly and and the gel depositing a lot of product will not differ. I strongly recommend Anastasia DipBrow and Gel instead. It is worth the $$.

But if your just looking to shade in, this is a great product.

name: StudioNC42

name: Joitall
review: The added brow wand is an excellent feature to shape the brows and provides a final blend. Just be careful not to apply too much.

name: clover34
review: I have light,thin brows and this fills them in nicely! I can make them light for day and darker for a night out.

If they can change the smell of this then I definitely will buy again as it does what it is supposed to.  If you can get beyond the smell then it may be for you!

name: Senora Cortes

review: The gel works to color and control your brows.  The pencil pigment is such that you have to go over it more than once.  I have thinning brows due to aging so this works to fill in sparse areas.

review: I love the concept of this duo for eyebrows but really, it doesn't deliver.  My biggest complaint is that the liquid part does nothing. You put it on and all it does is add a bit of color. Also the liquid side lasts above and beyond the pencil so you are stuck with a half used brow pencil duo in your makeup drawer because the pencil has worn out and can't be sharpened anymore.  That is so frustrating, I have to say!  Not worth the money.  You are better off buying the two seperate.
